## Overview



IBM [SPSS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SPSS) Statistics is one of the most widely used statistical software packages in the world. If you did a social science degree then there's a good chance you were taught it. This pages has some resources to get you started.



- [An old handout on the IBM SPSS Statistics environment, including entering data and some basic graphs](../repository/revisespss.pdf)
- [Data for Discovering Statistics using IBM SPSS Statistics](https://discoverspss.com/pages/data)
